subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Doping (Sports)
Television
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: In January on Oprah Winfrey’s cable network, Lance Armstrong could have dropped to his knees, wept and begged forgiveness. But he would never crack like that.
snippet: In January on Oprah Winfrey’s cable network, Lance Armstrong could have dropped to his knees, wept and begged forgiveness. But he would never crack like that.
